title: Sunlit Studio Retreat in Leafy Kamienny Potok
description: Nestled within a charming building, this inviting studio offers a thoughtful open floor plan, accentuated by gentle natural light that dances through generous windows. At 29 sqm, the space is intelligently designed, maximizing comfort and function—from cozy living to restful slumber, all unified in one elegant area. Ample closet space and an allocated storage locker make it easy to maintain a tidy, clutter-free lifestyle. The studio opens directly onto a serene, shared courtyard, ideal for that morning coffee or quiet reflection.
neighborhood_description: Kamienny Potok is Sopot’s hidden gem for lovers of greenery and gentle city life, marked by parklands and quiet trails weaving between ochre-roofed homes. Easy access to well-connected public transport and well-tended bike lines unlocks effortless exploration along the coast and beyond. With friendly markets, lush parks, and accessible highways close at hand, this neighborhood caters to those craving active days enveloped by nature.
lifestyle_benefits: access to green walking and cycling trails
secure communal spaces ideal for sociable retirees
target_buyer: Perfect for retirees seeking a peaceful yet socially rich downsized lifestyle amid nature, while retaining easy connections to Sopot’s cultural life and medical amenities.
market_positioning: This sun-filled studio stands out locally as an affordable, wellness-focused sanctuary. It bridges urban convenience with tranquil, nature-oriented living—rarely offered in Sopot at this accessible price point.
